properties.description: This manufacturing plant collects all of the raw materials for the production.

properties.title: Stainless Steel
properties.description: The stainless steel also comes from the plant.

properties.title: Bauxite
properties.description: This little Island is where the most production of bauxite is from.

properties.title: Plastic
properties.description: Russia besides China is the largest exporter/producer of plastic

properties.title: Final Assembly
properties.description: This plant not only produces copper but it is where the pen is put together.

properties.title: Consumer (Me)
properties.description: Even though I prefer a pencil I still love those god old pens.

properties.title: Aluminum to Manufacturing Plant for the raw materials
Stainless Steel to Manufacturing Plant for the raw materials
Bauxite to Manufacturing Plant for the raw materials
Plastic to Manufacturing Plant for the raw materials
Manufacturing Plant for the raw materials to Final Assembly
properties.description: The Manufacturing Plant is just before the assembly of all the parts.

This Supply Chain is the process of the collecting Raw materials and sending them "down the line" to production and distribution of the finished product to the consumer and then the Consumer would consume it. The amount of flying and driving and sailing had to do to make this pen is catastrophic and I think it would reduce the harmful gases if there was one place that it was made/sold and that would help for not only us but the entire Earth too.
properties.title: From Plastic to Pen
